customerService.title: Customer Service
customerService.subtitle: We're here to help. Find answers to common questions.
customerService.helpDesc: Check our FAQ, shipping info, and policies.
customerService.verifyDescription: Ensure your luxury fragrance is an authentic TIVAQ Fragrance creation and claim your loyalty rewards. Every verification awards you points for future discounts!
customerService.faq1Q: How do I track my order?
customerService.faq1A: Once your order ships, you'll receive a WhatsApp message with shipping details.
customerService.faq2Q: What payment methods do you accept?
customerService.faq2A: We accept cash on delivery and bank transfers. You can also pay via electronic wallet.
customerService.faq3A: Yes, you can return the product within 7 days of receipt provided it's in original condition.
customerService.faq4A: Yes! All our products are 100% authentic. You can verify through the NFC code included with each product.
customerService.faq5Q: How do I contact customer support?
customerService.faq5A: You can reach us via WhatsApp directly or through our Instagram page.
customerService.shipping1: Free shipping on orders over 500 EGP
customerService.termsIntro: By using our website and services, you agree to the following terms.
customerService.terms1Text: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services.
customerService.terms2Text: All orders are subject to availability. Prices are subject to change.
customerService.terms3Text: All content on this website is the property of TIVAQ Fragrance and protected by copyright laws.
customerService.privacyIntro: Your privacy is important to us.
customerService.privacy1Text: We collect information you provide directly, such as name and email when you create an account.
customerService.privacy2Text: We use your information to process orders, communicate with you, and improve our services.
customerService.privacy3Text: We implement security measures to protect your data.

admin.deleteConfirm: You won't be able to revert this!

admin.priceRequired: Price is required and must be greater than 0.

verify.title: Verify Your Purchase
verify.subtitle: Enter the NFC code from your product to confirm your purchase and earn points.
verify.step1: Complete your order via WhatsApp with the seller.
verify.step2: When you receive the product, find the NFC code on the packaging.
verify.step3: Enter the code below to confirm your purchase and earn loyalty points.
verify.successDesc: Your product is authentic. You have earned 50 loyalty points!
verify.failedDesc: The NFC code doesn't match. Please check the code and try again.
verify.alreadyUsed: This NFC code has already been used and cannot be redeemed again.
verify.alreadyUsedDesc: You can still browse the product and listen to audio.
verify.noOrderDesc: It seems you arrived here without placing an order. Please go back and try again.
verify.scanTagDesc: Use your phone to scan the NFC tag or QR code on the packaging.
verify.exclusiveAccessDesc: Verification is only available via the physical security tag on your TIVAQ Fragrance bottle.

amber-night.name: Amber Night
amber-night.description: Sweet amber blended with vanilla and subtle spices.
